Control Name: 5.4.5 Deployments are automated and it's possible to deploy N+1 and N-1 version (where N is the current production).
Control Statement: N-1 and N+1 refer to roll-back and roll-forward. Automated deployment pipelines should allow for quick roll-forward and roll-back deployments to address critical bugs and code updates outside of the normal deployment lifecycle.
